messages.message:
OK I figured this out, in all our go services we listen to
```	addr := fmt.Sprintf(":%v", cfg.ServiceJobPort)```
that is equivalent to 0.0.0.0:port
we should instead have
```	addr := fmt.Sprintf("localhost:%v", cfg.ServiceJobPort)```
when running things locally. localhost:port / 127.0.0.1:port - mean that we only listening to localhost which is good enough. We donâ€™t need these services exposed to outside world.
will send out a PR soon
